plants.germinationNeeds: Propagate from 'slips' (sprouts from a mature tuber). Plant after last frost. Minimum soil temp: 18°C, Optimum: 24-29°C.
plants.optimalConditions: Full sun. Prefers well-drained, sandy loam. Needs a long, warm growing season of at least 5 months. Frost sensitive.

plants.germinationNeeds: Sow seeds indoors in early spring. Minimum germination temp: 10°C, Optimum: 21-27°C. Transplant after last frost.
plants.optimalConditions: Full sun (6-8 hours). Fertile, well-drained soil. Requires consistent watering and support/staking.

plants.germinationNeeds: Direct sow after last frost. Minimum soil temp: 16°C, Optimum: 21-35°C. Plant seeds 2-3cm deep.
plants.optimalConditions: Full sun. Rich, fertile, well-drained soil. Very productive; give them plenty of space to grow.

plants.germinationNeeds: Sow indoors in early spring. Minimum germination temp: 18°C, Optimum: 25-30°C. Slow to germinate.
plants.optimalConditions: Needs a long, warm season. Full sun, in a spot sheltered from wind. Well-drained, fertile soil.

history.notes: Start on a heat pad for best results.

plants.germinationNeeds: Sow after last frost, as it's very frost sensitive. Minimum germination temp: 15°C, Optimum: 20-25°C.
plants.optimalConditions: Full sun. Rich, moist, but well-drained soil. Pinch out tips to encourage bushy growth.

plants.germinationNeeds: Direct sow after last frost. Minimum soil temp: 16°C, Optimum: 20-25°C. Do not soak seeds before planting.
plants.optimalConditions: Full sun. Well-drained soil. Don't need overly rich soil. Pick beans regularly to encourage more production.

plants.germinationNeeds: Sow direct or in trays. Light aids germination. Minimum germination temp: 2°C, Optimum: 15-21°C. Germination is poor in hot soil.
plants.optimalConditions: Full sun in cooler months, partial shade in the heat of summer. Keep soil consistently moist.

plants.germinationNeeds: Best grown from a purchased plant for reliable fruiting. Plant in autumn or spring. Can be grown from seed but fruit quality varies. Min temp for seed germination: 20°C.
plants.optimalConditions: Full sun. Hardy and tolerates a range of soil types, but needs good drainage. Tolerant of light frosts. A Kiwi classic.

history.notes: Established well, expecting first fruit this season.
